Package edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.evalform

Class GenerateEvalReportPoi

java.lang.Object
edu.sru.group3.WebBasedEvaluations.evalform.GenerateEvalReportPoi
public class GenerateEvalReportPoi extends Object
Contains methods for generating an Excel file using Apache POI based on a set of completed Evaluations.
Author:
Logan Racer

  • Method Details

    • generateReport

      public static void generateReport(Evaluation evalTemp, List<Evaluation> completedEvals, String TEMP_FILES_PATH, String FILE_NAME) throws Exception
      Generate an evaluation Summary/Analysis Excel file (.xlsx) using Apache POI from a set of completed Evaluations of a given Evaluation ID.
      Parameters:
      evalTemp - - Blank Evaluation which was assigned to the group.
      completedEvals - - List of completed Evaluations.
      filePath - - String containing the path of where the excel file should be saved.
      fileName - - String containing the desired name of the excel file. (must have .xlsx file extension)
      Throws:
      Exception

    • initializeStyle

      private static void initializeStyle(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook wb)
      Initializes the styles used in the creating the excel sheet.
      Parameters:
      wb - - The XFFSWorkbook

    • dropToolTipFormatting

      private static String dropToolTipFormatting(String str)
      Remove SPAN HTML tags from the string.
      Parameters:
      str - - The string to process
      Returns:
      str - The string with formatting removed

    • loadQuestions

      private static String loadQuestions(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook wb, Evaluation eval) throws Exception
      Formats all data columns in the analysis excel file. Data is retrieved from the Evaluation template object.
      Parameters:
      wb - - Apache POI XSSFWorkbook object
      eval - - Blank Evaluation template
      Returns:
      setupData - Array of setup data which is used to format the remainder of the Evaluations.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • averageScoresPerReviewee

      private static List<Evaluation> averageScoresPerReviewee(List<Evaluation> allCompleteEvals)
      Takes Questions and Scores from each completed Evaluation and computes the averages for each reviewee.
      Parameters:
      allCompleteEvals - - List of all completed Evaluation objects
      Returns:
      averagedEvaluations - List of Evaluations containing averaged scores. One Evaluation for each reviewee.

    • addRecord

      private static void addRecord(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook wb, Evaluation eval, int rowIndex) throws Exception
      Adds one reviewees averaged scores to the evaluation analysis excel file.
      Parameters:
      wb - - Apache POI XSSFWorkbook object
      eval - - Evaluation object containing the averaged scores for one reviewees completed Evaluations.
      rowIndex - - Int representing the index of which row the record should be placed in the excel file.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • addTotals

      private static void addTotals(org.apache.poi.xssf.usermodel.XSSFWorkbook wb, int preloadCols, int dataCols, int totalRecords, Evaluation eval)
      Adds the totals columns and rows in the Workbook.
      Parameters:
      wb - - Apache POI XSSFWorkbook object
      preloadCols - - Int representing the number of columns used for the pre-load information
      dataCols - - Int representing the number of columns used for the question and section scores
      totalRecords - - Int representing the number of rows where reviewee records exist.
      eval - - Evaluation template used to get compute range information
